head.title: The CDK Developers
head.summary: List of developers and their specialties.

section.title: Who is Who?
section.para:
This section lists the developers and contributers and their specialties.
NameAffiliationSpecialtiesPackages
Christoph Steinbeck (steinbeck) Cologne University Bioinformatics Center (CUBIC) Structure Diagram Generation cdk.layout, cdk.structgen
Egon Willighagen (egonw) University of Nijmegen, Dep. of Analytical Chemistry Chemical Markup Language (CML) oo.cdk.io, cdk.dict, cdk.validate, cdk.iupac
Anatoli Krassavine (akrassavine) Intellidos Ltd., Oxfordshire, UK Consulting
Junfeng Hao (jhao) Cologne University Bioinformatics Center (CUBIC) Structure Generation cdk.structgen
Juergen Harter (jharter) BioWisdom Ltd., Cambrige UK Chemical Ontology
Kai Hartmann (kaihartmann) Cologne University Bioinformatics Center (CUBIC) Structure Generation cdk.structgen
Michael T Howard (michaelthoward)
Jmol 3D Viewer
Peter Murray-Rust (petermr) Unilever Center for Molecular Informatics, Cambridge, UK General Chemoinformatics, CML
Rajarshi Guha (rajarshi)
Chemometrics
Stefan Kuhn (shk3) Cologne University Bioinformatics Center (CUBIC) Structure Generation cdk.structgen
Yong Zhang (yz237) Unilever Center for Molecular Informatics, Cambridge, UK World Wide Molecular Matrix (WWMM) cdk.internet
Edgar Luttmann (edgarl) University of Paderborn
Yongquan Han (yongquan) University of Erlangen, Computer Chemistry Center Structure Generation, Genetic Algorithms
